comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: Frederick Cumber Baxter was the son of Clara Chapman (formerly Baxter), of 63 Bradford Road, Shipley, Yorkshire, and the late Edwin Baxter.  1/7 (Leeds Rifles) went to France in April 1915.  They were brigaded, together with 1/8 (Leeds Rifles) and 7th and 8th Bns West Yorkshire Regiment, in 146 Brigade as part of 49th (West Riding) Division.

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Frederick Cumber Baxter's birth was registered in the 2nd qr of 1892 in the West Riding of Yorkshire (FreeBMD)
